name: Google Calendar Styled
description:
Works with SCRITP on http://userscripts.org/scripts/review/181368

/!\ The script has been moved to : https://greasyfork.org/fr/scripts/10742-google-calendar-restyled /!\

PLEASE, FEEL FREE TO GIVE ME YOUR FEEDBACK

overflow correction

bug correction

corrections for Firefox

adding transition effect
correction of "Vues" background display

adding left bar hiding to give a full sight of the time table

Totally  redisigned.

button's position
colors display

1/2 rows color display

still some corrections planned

 - nth-child(odd) or nth-child(even) not properly functionnal in listview

correction of display in week view
known bug : nth-child(odd) or nth-child(even) not properly functionnal in listview 

V.0.1 - improving
Listview upgrade planned

discussions.name: Nice work and very clean -- but some corrections very needed
